short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance GOATS by seamlessly integrating query capabilities and target selection from ANTARES directly into GOATS with just a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance GOATS by seamlessly integrating query capabilities and target selection from ANTARES directly into GOATS with just a click. This extension reads the URL from the ANTARES website, parses the query or single target, and sends it to the local GOATS instance, enabling efficient target brokering.
